titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: BREAST SCREENING READING TYPE ARBITRATE WHEN ABNORMAL (PERCENTAGE) - Description

body.p: BREAST SCREENING READING TYPE ARBITRATE WHEN ABNORMAL (PERCENTAGE) is the percentage of women whose images were read using the BREAST SCREENING READING TYPE recorded as National Code 'Double reading: with arbitration when abnormal (arbitrate unless all readers agree normal)' .
